title: As Embarrassing As It Gets
description:
Josh, a social media producer at Barstool Sports, goes on a Twitter tirade & possibly to Human Resources after the show addressed his "alleged" incident earlier in the week (00:08:34). A communication breakdown leads to the latest KMS T-Shirt offering being put up for sale without Kirk signing off on it (00:24:22). Quantum Week Chris and Dave have a game off (00:36:01). Alec Baldwin is hanging out in New England after the incident on the set of 'Rust' (01:0021) & much more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
